#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,m,k,i,a[100005],temp,out;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        out=0;
        cin>>n>>m>>k;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)cin>>a[i];

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            temp=m;
            while(temp>0 && a[i]>=k)
            {
                a[i]=a[i]-k;
                temp--;
            }
            out=(out%1000000007 + a[i]%1000000007)%1000000007;
        }

        cout<<out<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
